wikipedia_page.main: William Hopkins (11 November 1888 – 26 January 1938), also commonly known as Pop or Bill Hopkins, was an English professional footballer who made 183 appearances in the Football League playing as a centre half for Sunderland, Leeds City, South Shields, Hartlepools United and Durham City. After his playing career, he worked as a trainer with several Football League clubs.

response: *Bill Hopkins (composer) (1943–1981), British composer, pianist and critic
